mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.NOTICE_NAME , N.NOTICE_CONTENT , N.NOTICE_LINK , N.NOTICE_COUNT , NF.NOTICE_ORI_NAME , NF.NOTICE_FILE_NUM , NF.NOTICE_FILE_NAME , NF.SAVED_PATH FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_FILE NF ON (N.NOTICE_NO = NF.NOTICE_NO) WHERE N.NOTICE_NO = #{ noticeNo }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_NAME , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_REGIST_DATE , NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE , NOTICE_LINK , NOTICE_COUNT ) VALUES ( NOTICE_NO , #{ noticeName } , #{ noticeContent } , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , NULL , #{ noticeLink } , 0 )
